title: SentimentResult
description: Model output attached to a text item, supporting multiple models/versions.

id.description: Unique identifier for this sentiment inference run.

text_item_id.description: Foreign key linking back to the normalized TextItem.id.

model_name.description: Short code for the model or API provider (hf_roberta, openai_sentiment).

model_version.description: Semantic version or git hash for reproducibility.

pipeline_stage.description: Where the score was produced: batch, realtime, retrain_eval.

scored_at.description: UTC timestamp when the model produced this score.

label.description: Primary sentiment class. Extend enum for multi-class models.

scores_by_label.description: Optional full distribution keyed by label.

explanations.description: Token or span attributions for explainability.

annotations.description: Manual reviewer overrides or QA notes.
